# Scale Scale subsequent drawing operations. ## Basic Scaling `draw canvas [ scale 2 2 box 0 0 50 50 ]` ## Parameters - **x-scale**: Horizontal scale factor - **y-scale**: Vertical scale factor ## Uniform Scaling `draw canvas [ scale 1.5 circle 100 100 50 ]` ## Negative Scale (Flip) `draw canvas [ scale -1 1 text "Flipped" 100 100 ]` ## See Also - [Transforms](/wiki/graphics/transforms/) - Transform overview - [Rotate](/wiki/graphics/transforms/rotate/) - Rotation transforms
